Sends new number when SIM card is changed

You can remotely wipe personal data in the lost phone (Including Contacts and SMS) by sending above SMS command from any phone, an SMS message will be received after operation is completed. Caution: This operation will wipe out the important data in the target device!
Current used number of your lost phone
To locate your lost phone, please send above command from any phone or fill the following information to confirm.
Anti-Theft password of your lost phone
Username should contain no less than 3 letters.
Password should be no less than 4 characters
Password has been sent to your mailbox, please check！
Do you want to close selected processes?
Do you want to close all processes?

Kindroid Security is a safe security and system management application based on the android system with characteristic of high stability, less occupancy and accurate statistics. Equip with anti-virus cloud scanning, network traffic monitoring, spam SMS and harassing calls blocking as its core function; in additional, other useful functions as task management, application and APK install and uninstall management, contacts online backup, remote anti-theft and data wiping are also available. \nKindroid Security sees the user experience and interaction design as the core function, based on improve function details and enhance software reliability, in order to bring you a perfect security protection and system optimization application! \nThis version does not apply to ophone, LePhone and other non-standard Android system mobiles.
SIM card replaced, please save this number.
Upload contacts, SMS and software list in the mobile to cloud server
Download contacts, SMS and software lists from cloud server to mobile
Log on cloud server to check backup software list
“Restore” is to copy all the information from cloud server to local. All restored data would remain the same as those on the cloud server after this.
Step 1, enter user ID and password
To get back your password, please press\u0020
By sending a SMS to the security number from the lost/stolen device to easily get the mobile number of another end. Wipe contacts, positioning remotely is available.
Block device after replacing SIM card.
Blocks the lost/stolen device if the SIM card was replaced. The password is required to access any function of the device.
1、An automatic SMS would be sent to security number %1$s if SIM card was replaced, you could easily get the mobile number of another end and wipe personal data remotely.
2、Blocks the lost/stolen device if the SIM card was replaced. The password is required to access any function of the device. Please remember your code.
2、SIM card block function is off! Mobile block is not available after SIM card was replaced.
3、If you forget all the information above mentioned, please leave your e-mail address and all of the information would be sent to you. (optional)
Following function and service are availabe after login
Backup contacts, SMS, software list on cloud server
SMS notice after device was lost/ stolen, wipe material, positioning remotely
Continue to cover the former data on cloud server?
Setting guide would help you to complete the remote anti-theft set:
Please enter your Email for contact (optional)
This version is available for Android 2.0 or above mobiles. Free of download and install, network traffic cost would be charged by ISP during operating
